docs.snippet: Counsel for fourteen seamen convicted of conspiracy and endeavor to revolt aboard the governmentowned freighter Algic at Montevideo, Uruguay, last Sept. 10 told the Federal Circuit Court of Appeals today that the Wagner act gave them the right of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Counsel for fourteen seamen convicted of conspiracy and endeavor to revolt aboard the governmentowned freighter Algic at Montevideo, Uruguay, last Sept. 10 told the Federal Circuit Court of Appeals today that the Wagner act gave them the right of "concerted action".
docs.abstract: counsel says sit-down was concerted action legal under Wagner Act

headline.main: DENIES MUTINY BY SEAMEN; Counsel Argues That Sit-Down on Algic Was 'Concerted Action'

docs.snippet: President Getulio Vargas returned here today after a two weeks' stay in Rio Grande do Sul, his native State, and was received with a great ovation despite a protest by him.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Getulio Vargas returned here today after a two weeks' stay in Rio Grande do Sul, his native State, and was received with a great ovation despite a protest by him.
docs.abstract: Announces he will not return to Wash

headline.main: VARGAS BACK IN CAPITAL; Gets Ovation as He Returns From Stay in Rio Grande do Sul

docs.snippet: WITH the new highway to Mexico City, now in its second year of use, already increasing Winter travel across the border by 50 per cent, motorists skimming south are reminded of what awaits them when that route is eventually extended
